serviceType.description: The type of the service (VM, container, process)

hostId.description: The identifier of the host machine of the service

tag.description: The tagging of the service linked to the service type and its client's context

criticalityLevel.description: Level of criticality linked to the service

logicalDependencies.description: List of all services on which the service depends (data, processing)

metrics.description: List of metrics to monitor according to the type of service
